ygData.subject: Bard macros
ygData.msgSnippet: Now that we have 10 banks of 10 social hotkeys each, its time to do some serious macroing.  Does anyone have a list of all the macros they have for bard songs?
ygData.messageBody:
Now that we have 10 banks of 10 social hotkeys each, its time to do some
serious macroing. Does anyone have a list of all the macros they have for
bard songs? If so please share them. I tried to set up a macro for one
pulse of heal and two pulses of mana song. Didn't do something right as
neither one of them ever started up.

Thanks
Galtin of E'ci


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
